attributes.action: Stop parents doing the school run and provide school buses for all children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Congestion in mornings and afternoons is mainly caused by parents taking children to school, vast majority are people that live within a couple of miles of the school and this clearly contributes serious congestion on our roads and motorways. All schools should be provided funding for school buses to take children to and from school therefore cutting down congestion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
